homes_hear_details: Rhode Island has launched its HOMES and HEAR rebate programs under the Inflation Reduction Act. The Rhode Island Office of Energy Resources (OER) is administering the programs in coordination with RI Energy (formerly National Grid) and existing energy efficiency programs.
state_energy_office: Rhode Island Office of Energy Resources (OER)

income_thresholds.low_income_80_ami: For Rhode Island, 80% of Area Median Income is based on the Providence-Warwick metropolitan area. 80% AMI for a family of four is approximately $72,650.
income_thresholds.moderate_income_150_ami: For Rhode Island, 150% of Area Median Income for a family of four is approximately $136,200 based on the Providence-Warwick metropolitan area.

net_metering: Rhode Island has strong net metering rules under the Renewable Energy Net Metering Act. Residential customers can net meter systems up to 25 kW. Customers receive credit at the full retail rate for excess generation. The state also has a Renewable Energy Growth Program that provides above-market-rate compensation for small-scale renewable energy projects.

state_tax_credits.name: Rhode Island Renewable Energy Property Tax Exemption
state_tax_credits.amount: 100% property tax exemption for the value added by renewable energy systems for the life of the system
state_tax_credits.eligible_items: Solar photovoltaic systems, wind energy systems, and other qualifying renewable energy installations
state_tax_credits.details: Rhode Island exempts the added value of qualifying renewable energy systems from local property taxes.

state_rebate_programs.name: RI Energy (formerly National Grid) Residential Energy Efficiency Programs
state_rebate_programs.administrator: RI Energy / Rhode Island Energy Efficiency Resource Management Council
state_rebate_programs.amount: Up to $2,000 for heat pumps, up to $4,000 for weatherization, $50-$750 for ENERGY STAR appliances
state_rebate_programs.eligible_items: Heat pumps (ductless and ducted), insulation, air sealing, smart thermostats, ENERGY STAR appliances, heat pump water heaters, windows
state_rebate_programs.details: RI Energy administers comprehensive residential energy efficiency programs funded through the System Benefit Charge. Rhode Island's programs are among the strongest in the nation, consistently ranking highly for per-capita energy efficiency spending.

state_rebate_programs.name: Renewable Energy Growth Program
state_rebate_programs.administrator: RI Energy / Rhode Island Office of Energy Resources
state_rebate_programs.amount: Fixed per-kWh compensation above retail rate for 20 years (rate varies by project class and year)
state_rebate_programs.eligible_items: Small-scale solar (up to 25 kW for residential), wind, and other renewable energy systems
state_rebate_programs.details: The Renewable Energy Growth Program provides long-term, above-market-rate compensation for small-scale renewable energy generation through performance-based incentives.

state_rebate_programs.name: Weatherization Assistance Program
state_rebate_programs.administrator: Rhode Island Department of Human Services
state_rebate_programs.amount: Average expenditure of approximately $8,500 per home
state_rebate_programs.eligible_items: Insulation, air sealing, heating system repair or replacement, windows, doors
state_rebate_programs.details: Federally funded program for income-qualifying households at or below 200% of federal poverty level.

top_utilities.name: RI Energy (formerly National Grid Rhode Island)

programs.name: EnergyWise Home Energy Assessment
programs.amount: Free or reduced-cost ($25) comprehensive home energy assessment with direct-install measures
programs.eligible_items: Home energy audit including free LED bulbs, smart power strips, low-flow showerheads, and faucet aerators. Identifies opportunities for weatherization and HVAC upgrades.

programs.name: Heat Pump Rebates
programs.amount: Up to $2,000 per system for qualifying air-source heat pumps
programs.eligible_items: ENERGY STAR certified ductless mini-split and ducted heat pump systems

programs.name: Appliance Rebates
programs.eligible_items: Heat pump water heaters, smart thermostats, ENERGY STAR dehumidifiers, ENERGY STAR dryers

programs.name: Residential Energy Efficiency Rebates
programs.eligible_items: High-efficiency HVAC, insulation, ENERGY STAR appliances
